Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to discuss the upcoming federal budget expressing their opinions on issues such as rent assistance incentivizing women's return to work correcting past policies related to poverty and age 16. There are numerous calls for action regarding poverty financial support and tax reform. However there are also criticisms of media sources and discussions of panel appearances which have led some to question the fairness and balance of shows like #Insiders. Overall the online conversation regarding these political issues in Australia seems to be highly engaged and opinionated.
